title: Video: Bravestation – Signs of the Civilized
content:
Bravestation helped craft one of my favourite festival memories to date.

Last year at Newcastle’s Evolution Festival after meeting the four piece for the first time, we spent the rest of the day hanging out (read: drinking) before all heading back to mine and all crashing on the various sofa’s that my parents had at their disposal. Not only are they cracking guys, but they also write some of the most infectious melodies around, as portrayed by recent single Signs of the Civilized, a gloriously epic track, destined to propel them to greater heights. Accompanied by the wonderfully poetic Game of Thrones inspired video, Signs of the Civilized is taken from their upcoming debut album entitled Giants & Dreamers out 10 July. Oh and as if you need any more persuading, the video contains several rather attractive young women.
